author: Bobby Quinn
title: paypixl - Validating Drone Metadata
description: Customers ordering drone imagery need to validate the metadata of collected drone imagery to ensure images weren't edited or modified.
solution: Use a hybrid blockchain + traditional data send method to send/receive images and supporting documents with blockchain metadata validation.
experience: 15 years aerial and satellite imagery acquisition, 7 years combined in blockchain, currently completing a Masters in Blockchain Technology
